DIA_Jorn_Q101_Hello_01_03: I heard the captain giving orders to his men. They're about to drop anchor.
DIA_Jorn_Q101_Hello_15_04: Which means we're about to find out what a good idea it was to come all the way to Archolos.
DIA_Jorn_Q101_Hello_01_05: Talk to the others, keep your head busy, and I'll stand on the lookout in the meantime.
DIA_Jorn_Q101_Hello_01_06: Maybe I can find out something else...
DIA_Jorn_Q101_AfterFabioFight_01_00: We haven't even made it to shore yet, and you're already looking for a bruise?
DIA_Jorn_Q101_AfterFabioFight_01_02: Certainly, but you could still get in trouble for it, little brother.
DIA_Jorn_Q101_AfterFabioFight_15_03: He had an awfully strong punch...
DIA_Jorn_Q101_AfterFabioFight_01_05: Next time, aim between the eyes. It always works.
DIA_Jorn_Q101_WhatsUp_01_02: I can't hear anything over this raging sea.
DIA_Jorn_Q101_WhatsUp_Yes_01_01: Well, as they say, the more the merrier. It's just a shame you met them under these circumstances.
DIA_Jorn_Q101_WhatsUp_No_01_01: When we get to the mainland, you will definitely have the opportunity to meet a lot of interesting people.
DIA_Jorn_Q101_CaptainComing_01_01: The island must be in sight by now, but...
DIA_Jorn_Q101_CaptainComing_01_02: Quiet... do you hear? I think someone's coming...
